title: Is the Roland A-88MKII MIDI keyboard controller worth $1,000? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every persons answer to the question will be different. It all depends on needs and wants. Roland will use its experience in the market to set a price point where it thinks it can maximise its profit - ie enough people will believe it worth the amount and want to buy it v the lower the price the less profit they will make. So the only thing that matters is - is it worth it for you.
